Pro JavaScript RIA Techniques: Best Practices, Performance, and Presentation – Den Odell. Apress, New York. 2009

Get the Book from Springer

Cited in 50+ academic works across 17 countries and 7 languages, and held in major university libraries — a global reference for JavaScript Rich Internet Application development.

As a front-end architect with 25 years of experience, I authored Pro JavaScript RIA Techniques: Best Practices, Performance, and Presentation (Apress, 2009) to enhance rich internet applications. Cited in 54 academic works across 17 countries and 7 languages, translated into Chinese and Czech, and held in libraries like Harvard, Oxford and Cambridge, it’s accessed 6,800+ times on SpringerLink. Used in courses at universities like Burgos, it shapes global RIA practices alongside my second book, with over 80 citations combined. Explore Pro JavaScript RIA Techniques or contact me to discuss JavaScript innovation.

ISBN: 978-1-4302-1934-7 (Print), 978-1-4302-1935-4 (eBook).
DOI: 10.1007/978-1-4302-1935
